articles.author: Field Museum
articles.title: Ancient tools from a South African cave reveal connections between prehistoric people - Phys.org
articles.description: In a cave overlooking the ocean on the southern coast of South Africa, archaeologists discovered thousands of stone tools, created by ancient humans roughly 20,000 years ago. By examining tiny details in the chipped edges of the blades and stones, archaeologi…
